name: Who wants to strip this babe? Hentai Streamer Girl
name_original: Who wants to strip this babe? Hentai Streamer Girl
description:
The combination of the well-known TV show with the best genre of games on earth. This awesome girl will test your knowledge of computer games. With each correct answer, she will take off one thing at a time, and after answering the last question you will open a new scene with her participation :)

Magic word: "Senpai"
